Name: Waifu Packer
About the game: Waifu Packer is puzzle game where you try to fit tiles into boxes by moving them around on a grid. Each level you unlock an image of a beautiful waifu which will be waiting for you in the gallery! Your goal is to fit all the tiles into the game area, avoiding possible obstacles. You can drag and drop tiles and rotate them in space. Each level you will unlock new tiles with various shapes. The game escalates in complexity, in the first levels you will learn how to play (no boring tutorial needed) and in the later levels you will scratch your head and ponder! Lots of different waifus, both cute and nude! Game area with increasing sizes and obstacles 40 levels with increasing difficulty Fun and polished gameplay (we mean, really fun!) Authentic hentai female moans Different levels with different tiles, obstacles and game area size Increasing difficulty from absolutely trivial to challenging How does the game work? When you start a level, there will be lots of tiles placed out randomly over the game area. To make the level more interesting, the reward image of the girl is presented as a blurred background which will sharpen when you complete the level. Some of these girls are regular women, some are sexy maids, others are magical nymphomaniacs, but they all come in different body We've built a custom puzzle engine from scratch that allows for very highly polished gameplay and fine control over the smallest details and game feel.
